review: I truly wish I was paying for this monthly so I could have turned this back in already,  But no, I paid for a year and I have it even when I could go happily without it.  First, the "easy" installation took a couple of hours.  There are no instructions for how to install it if you have TiVo or a wifi, and the Amazon rep also didn't know how to do it.  It turned out being a simple connection.  So yes it WAS easy, once we knew what to do.  But then I was hoping there would be enough to choose from that I could get rid of my cable TV, but there isn't.  If you have Prime it's better, but still not all the movies are available and of the 20,000 titles that are available, most are pure crap..  And then there's the problem with losing connection.  Over and over.  I called tech support and was told there was nothing that could be done.  Love my Kindle, but have been totally underwhelmed with Amazon Fire TV.
